snippet: At least 22 people were killed in the firefight — all of them assailants, the military said. One soldier was injured.
abstract: Gun battle between Mexican soldiers and armed group that attacked a convoy leaves at least 22 people dead in one of the bloodiest confrontations in the drug war; three women who had been kidnapped are freed, and a large cache of assault rifles, ammunition and a grenade are seized.
lead_paragraph: At least 22 people were killed in the firefight — all of them assailants, the military said. One soldier was injured.

headline.main: Mexican Soldiers Wage Bloody Battle With Gang
headline.print_headline: Mexican Soldiers Wage Bloody Battle With Gang
